comment: Great genuine professor. I've taken him for International Management and now Strategic Management. Only downfalls i'd say is hes a bit slow on responding to messages and the group project is a heavy percentage, half of your grade. But all materials needed are given to succeed. Quizzes and exams super easy. Def take him for 4199.
Great professor! Definitely an easy A!

This course is easy, professor is eh. I've taken two courses with him now and the grading still makes absolutely no sense, and you will not get grades back in a timely manner so even though it usually turns out fine your lost on your grade until the end of the semester. Inputs final grades like 5 minutes before they're due. Just grade normal dude.

It's an online class. He gives a lot of flexibility to learn and is very understanding of personal situations. The discussions posts have a lot of flexibility and the quizzes are very straightforward. His quizzes and tests are open book.

He really is a great professor! Though an online class, he gives great feedback and makes it very clear what is expected of you. He gave us "grace" points for a few assignments this semester, just because. I highly recommend his online classes!
